casebody.data:
No. D-2521. In the Matter of Discipline of Bridgette Miriam Harris-Smith. 562 U.S. 811, 131 S. Ct. 401,

178 L. Ed. 2d 266,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 7574. October 4, 2010.

Bridgette Miriam *267Harris-Smith, of Washington, District of Columbia, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring her to show cause why she should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
